ygData.subject: Re: some info
ygData.msgSnippet: A good friend of mine told me he heard from someone that you could tinker a weightless bag. I shrugged it off as probably being nothing to
ygData.messageBody:
<html>
<font size=3>A good friend of mine told me he heard from someone that you
could tinker a weightless bag. I shrugged it off as probably being
nothing to it.  Since, I've heard of the bag here, I started to tell
him about it when he told me he  bought it already and it is a
weightless item bag. He is a level 47 paladin.  As far as tinkering
it.. I still don't buy it.<br>
<br>
At 12:23 AM 9/11/99 -0700, you wrote:<br>
>From: Eron Linver <aeron@...><br>
><br>
>I would pay 6000pp for the bag if it does indeed reduce weight to
zero.� But in<br>
>your haste to critique my post you failed to read it.� I want to know
how this<br>
>person does indeed know that the bag reduces weight to zero and that
it isn't just<br>
>a useless item.� Which is what I asked the first time.<br>
><br>
>Conrad Lesnewski wrote:<br>
><br>
>> From: Conrad Lesnewski <clesnew@...><br>
>><br>
>> Yes, his information is correct.�� I'm just confused as to how a
container<br>
>> that reduces the weight of all items to zero could be considered
useless????<br>
>> Not worth 6000pp perhaps, but useless??� If you ever come into
possession of a<br>
>> useless item like this (there are a number of weight reducing
containers in<br>
>> the game), let me know and I'll be happy to take it off your
hands :)<br>
>><br>
>> Eron Linver wrote:<br>
>><br>
>> > From: Eron Linver <aeron@...><br>
>> ><br>
>> > Are you sure of this?? Where did you hear this from.� I
don't want to blow<br>
>> > 6000 PP on something to find out it is useless.<br>
>> ><br>
><br>
>--Eron<br>
>aeron@...<br>
</font>
<BR>
<div>Audric - Xegony</div>
Corky's Castle -
<a href="http://home.globaleyes.net/corky" EUDORA=AUTOURL>http://home.GlobalEyes.net/corky</a>
</html>
